detail_desc: Short, two-strand necklace in twisted metal chains, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length 43–52 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved swim top with a motif, stand-up collar and seam with a flounce at the hem. UPF50.

Short, padded jacket in woven fabric with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a collar and adjustable drawstring. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket, long sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs, and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.

Sleeveless playsuit in an airy, textured weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Cut-out section at the back with a twisted detail at the top and elastication at the back of the waist. Jersey-lined bottom section.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and wide, flared hems.
Short top in ribbed jersey containing glittery threads with long sleeves and flounces down the front that continue over the back of the shoulders.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Fitted top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short-sleeved top in jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.

Bra in lace and mesh with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
Outdoor hat in breathable thermal fleece.
Suit trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless lace top with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and a pleated peplum. Lined.
Hi tops in imitation leather with imitation suede sections, a padded shaft, boot lacing and a crocodile-patterned imitation leather loop. Soft pile linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Sleeveless dress in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathered seam and decorative bow at the waist and a scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Boxy hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and high slits in the sides.
Shimmering metallic sandals with braided jute trims around the soles and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings, cotton insoles and textured soles.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with ties in a contrasting colour around the neck, a small stand-up collar and concealed button placket. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.

Ankle-length kaftan in a crêpe weave with flounces down the sides and a V-neck with a wide, flounced trim. Rounded hem with a flounced trim, and short slits in the sides. Slightly shorter at the front.
Jacquard-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Lined bandeau bikini top with a flounced trim and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back, a concealed silicone trim at the top and side support.
Short, glittery skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in sturdy washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, a button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover at the top and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless, calf-length lace dress with a small frilled collar and opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam with a small frill trim at the waist, and a raw-edge hem. V-neck jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, straight-style T-shirt dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, slightly wider neckline. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

All-in-one suit knitted in thermal fleece with contrasting colour trims, a jersey-lined hood, and two zips down the front with chin guards. Foldover ends at the cuffs and hems to keep the hands and feet warm. Fleece inside.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist and detachable belt with a covered buckle. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short puff sleeves, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Lace nursing bra with opening, cotton-lined cups with removable inserts and space for nursing pads. Wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Vest tops in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Suede trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Patterned bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.
Short, pattern-weave skirt with a visible zip at the back. Lined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Double-breasted pea coat in pile with narrow notch lapels, buttons at the front, side pockets and one inner pocket. Tabs with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lined.
Gently fitted gilet in soft faux fur with concealed front pockets and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a double-layered, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully-fashioned trainers with elastication around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles, and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and rubber soles.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Lightweight trainers in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Blouse in a sturdy cotton weave with a deep V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Pleats and a wide elasticated seam at the waist, long, wide sleeves with a gathered section and wide double-buttoned cuffs and a flare to the hem with an opening at the front.
Short dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Unlined.
Pleated top in soft jersey with a textured stripe and sheen. Straight-cut at the top in a wide, softly draping fit with wide shoulder straps.

Ankle-length boiler suit in lightweight cotton twill with a collar and press-studs at the front. V-shaped yoke front and back, chest pockets and patch front pockets. Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and belt with press-studs at the waist and wide, gently tapered legs.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey crêpe with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt that can be wound around several times. Unlined.
Tulle skirt with a gathered elasticated waist. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem.

Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with gathers and a small frill at the shoulders, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with frilled tiers. Lined.
Hooded jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look and a zip down the front. Front pockets, seams with decorative stitching on the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in suede with mesh details, lacing at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Metal earrings. Length 6 cm.

Wide, straight-cut shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Mug in transparent printed plastic with a screw top and straw. Diameter at the top 10 cm, height 15.5 cm.
T-shirts in soft jersey. The cotton content of the T-shirts is organic.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
High-waisted trousers in a soft cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, front pockets and tapered legs with a tab and metal D-rings at the hems.
Coat in a felted weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
